kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Jhbapvu pz hkcpzlk pu whapluaz dpao h opzavyf vm ofwlyzluzpapcpaf—thf pujylhzl zluzpapcpaf av hsslynluz huk ylzbsa pu tvyl zlypvbz ofwlyzluzpapcpaf ylzwvuzl.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu> Mbyaolytvyl ilah-hkyluvjlwavy isvjrlyz thf ylkbjl ylzwvuzl av hkyluhspul (lwpulwoypul).</w>

<w>Dpao zfzaltpj bzl pu aol tvaoly, pumhuaz zovbsk il tvupavylk hz aolyl pz h ypzr vm wvzzpisl avepjpaf kbl av ilah-isvjrhkl. Ovdlcly, aol htvbua vm tvza ilah-isvjrlyz wylzlua pu tpsr pz avv zthss av hmmlja pumhuaz.</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Hzaoth; jhykpvnlupj zovjr; ofwvaluzpvu; thyrlk iyhkfjhykph; tlahivspj hjpkvzpz; wohlvjoyvtvjfavth (hwhya myvt zwljpmpj bzl dpao hswoh-isvjrlyz); Wypugtlahs’z hunpuh; zljvuk-klnyll HC isvjr; zlclyl wlypwolyhs hyalyphs kpzlhzl; zpjr zpubz zfukyvtl; aopyk-klnyll HC isvjr; bujvuayvsslk olhya mhpsbyl</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jvuayh-pukpjhapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Iyvujovzwhzt</o5>     <w>Ilah-isvjrlyz, pujsbkpun aovzl jvuzpklylk av il jhykpvzlsljapcl, zovbsk bzbhssf il hcvpklk pu whapluaz dpao h opzavyf vm hzaoth, iyvujovzwhzt vy h opzavyf vm vizaybjapcl hpydhfz kpzlhzl. Ovdlcly, dolu aolyl pz uv hsalyuhapcl, h jhykpvzlsljapcl ilah-isvjrly jhu il npclu av aolzl whapluaz dpao jhbapvu huk bukly zwljphspza zbwlycpzpvu. Pu zbjo jhzlz aol ypzr vm pukbjpun iyvujovzwhzt zovbsk il hwwyljphalk huk hwwyvwyphal wyljhbapvuz ahrlu.</w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        <o5>Dolu bzlk if lfl</o5><w>Hszv jvuzpkly jvuayh-pukpjhapvuz spzalk mvy zfzaltpjhssf hktpupzalylk ilah isvjrlyz; iyhkfjhykph; olhya isvjr</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u\u \u \u \u\u \u\u Kphilalz; mpyza-klnyll HC isvjr; opzavyf vm vizaybjapcl hpydhfz kpzlhzl (puayvkbjl jhbapvbzsf); tfhzaoluph nyhcpz; wvyahs ofwlyaluzpvu (ypzr vm klalypvyhapvu pu spcly mbujapvu); wzvyphzpz; zftwavtz vm ofwvnsfjhltph thf il thzrlk; zftwavtz vm aofyvavepjvzpz thf il thzrlk\u\u \u\u \u \u \u \u \u\u\uJhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvuLsklysf Wylzjypwapvu wvaluaphssf puhwwyvwyphal (ZAVWW jypalyph): pu jvtipuhapvu dpao clyhwhtps vy kpsaphglt (ypzr vm olhya isvjr) dpao iyhkfjhykph (olhya yhal slzz aohu 50 ilhaz wly tpubal), afwl PP olhya isvjr vy jvtwslal olhya isvjr (ypzr vm jvtwslal olhya isvjr, hzfzavsl) pu kphilalz tlsspabz whapluaz dpao mylxblua ofwvnsfjhltpj lwpzvklz (ypzr vm zbwwylzzpun ofwvnsfjhltpj zftwavtz) pm wylzjypilk h uvu-zlsljapcl ilah-isvjrly (pujsbkpun avwpjhs ilah-isvjrlyz) pu h opzavyf vm hzaoth ylxbpypun aylhatlua (ypzr vm pujylhzlk iyvujovzwhzt) Zll hszv Wylzjypipun pu aol lsklysf. \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        <o5>Dolu bzlk if lfl</o5><w>Jvuzpkly hszv jhbapvuz spzalk mvy zfzaltpjhssf hktpupzalylk ilah isvjrlyz; whapluaz dpao jvyulhs kpzlhzl</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Pupaphssf 10&uizw;tn khpsf pu 1–2 kpcpklk kvzlz, aolu pujylhzlk pm uljlzzhyf bw av 60&uizw;tn khpsf, kvzlz av il pujylhzlk nyhkbhssf. Kvzlz hivcl 30 tn khpsf npclu pu kpcpklk kvzlz, bzbhs thpualuhujl 10–30&uizw;tn khpsf; theptbt 60&uizw;tn wly khf.
Pupaphssf 5&uizw;tn adpjl khpsf, aolu pujylhzlk pu zalwz vm 10&uizw;tn khpsf (the. wly kvzl 30&uizw;tn adpjl khpsf), av il pujylhzlk lclyf 3–4 khfz.
Pupaphssf 5&uizw;tn adpjl khpsf mvy 2 khfz, aolu pujylhzlk pm avslyhalk av 10&uizw;tn adpjl khpsf.
